desc.cn: melt 是一个用于开发 GCC 扩展的领域特定语言，它是一个 Lisp 方言，可以编译成 C 代码。melt 可以让你用 Lisp 语法来编写中间端的优化和分析过程，例如静态单赋值形式、控制流图、数据流分析等。
desc.en: Backup and restore SSH private keys using memorizable seed phrases

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add https://github.com/charmbracelet/scoop-bucket.git
&& x scoop install melt

debian/apt.cmd:
sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings
&& curl -fsSL https://repo.charm.sh/apt/gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/charm.gpg
&& echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/charm.gpg] https://repo.charm.sh/apt/ * *"
&& sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/charm.list
&& sudo apt update
&& sudo apt install melt

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings
&& curl -fsSL https://repo.charm.sh/apt/gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/charm.gpg
&& echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/charm.gpg] https://repo.charm.sh/apt/ * *"
&& sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/charm.list
&& sudo apt update
&& sudo apt install melt

fedora/yum.cmd:
echo '[charm]
&& name=Charm
&& baseurl=https://repo.charm.sh/yum/
&& enabled=1
&& gpgcheck=1
&& gpgkey=https://repo.charm.sh/yum/gpg.key' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/charm.repo
&& sudo yum install melt

rhel/yum.cmd:
echo '[charm]
&& name=Charm
&& baseurl=https://repo.charm.sh/yum/
&& enabled=1
&& gpgcheck=1
&& gpgkey=https://repo.charm.sh/yum/gpg.key' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/charm.repo
&& sudo yum install melt

/build.cmd:
git clone https://github.com/charmbracelet/melt.git
&& cd melt
&& go build ./cmd/melt/
